attributes.action: Cancel UK lockdowns with immediate effect, due to flawed data to impose them
attributes.additional_details:
people are losing jobs and those jobs will not be there for so many to return to after lockdowns as many businesses are only just holding on right now
 many high streets will be worse than they were before all this and again some won’t survive. 
People not getting the treatments they need, increased deaths from terminal illness, 
old people suffering loneliness and serious heath issues because of effects of lock down, and mental health increasing.
attributes.background:
Cancel UK lockdown 2 immediately, decisions were made on flawed data and tests. Rabb has admitted that lockdown will end on the 2nd of December as they have made mistakes with the data used to impose them. 
They should end now before more damage is done

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045
